text: Regan Smith (born September 23, 1983) is an American stock car racing driver. He currently competes full-time in the NASCAR Sprint Cup Series. He drives the No. 7 Chevrolet SS for Tommy Baldwin Racing. He also races part-time in the Xfinity Series. There he drives the No. 88 Chevrolet Camaro for JR Motorsports, and the No. 2 Chevrolet Camaro for Richard Childress Racing. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official page Category:Living people Category:1983 births Category:American racecar drivers Category:NASCAR drivers Category:Sportspeople from New York (state)
title: Regan Smith
